title: Charge Indicator sound not working
content:
Hi

I've owned my Pixel 3 for week now and I do like the phone but have a number of minor grievances with it and have had a few bugs.

The latest one I've found is that the charging sound is not working when connecting the wire. I double checked and I definitely have the option turned on. I toggled it on and off and still nothing.

Anyone else experiencing this?

I wouldn't mind so much if there was a charge indicator light but obviously there isn't...

Cheers
